Token.Abstract: This MBEvents class category adds methods for managing events related to the asynchronous loading of data.
Constructs the name of the event that is fired when an asynchronous data load attempt is about to begin.

Parameter.Name: name
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the data item being requested.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The name of the event fired when the data item named name is about to be requested.

Token.Abstract: Constructs the name of the event that is fired when an asynchronous data load completes successfully.

Parameter.Name: name
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the data item that was loaded.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The name of the event fired when the data item named name loads successfully.

Token.Abstract: Constructs the name of the event that is fired when an asynchronous data load attempt fails.

Parameter.Name: name
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the data item that failed to load.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The name of the event fired when the data item named name fails to load.

Token.Abstract: Posts an event indicating that an asynchronous data load attempt is about to begin.

Parameter.Name: name
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the data item being requested.

Token.Abstract: Posts an event indicating that an asynchronous data load completed successfully.

Parameter.Name: name
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the data item that was loaded.

Token.Abstract: Posts an event indicating that an asynchronous data load failed.

Parameter.Name: name
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the data item that failed to load.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: An error object representing the nature of the failure.

Token.Abstract: Posts an event indicating that an asynchronous data load attempt is about to begin.

Parameter.Name: name
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the data item being requested.

Parameter.Name: eventObj
Parameter.Abstract: An object to include as the value of the NSNotification's object property.

Token.Abstract: Posts an event indicating that an asynchronous data load completed successfully.

Parameter.Name: name
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the data item that was loaded.

Parameter.Name: eventObj
Parameter.Abstract: An object to include as the value of the NSNotification's object property.

Token.Abstract: Posts an event indicating that an asynchronous data load failed.

Parameter.Name: name
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the data item that failed to load.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: An error object representing the nature of the failure.

Parameter.Name: eventObj
Parameter.Abstract: An object to include as the value of the NSNotification's object property.
